H0.text: An element is sodium chloride, which is formed in a chemical reaction between sodium (Na) and chlorine (Cl₂).

H1.text: A mixture is what sodium chloride is, formed in a chemical reaction between sodium (Na) and chlorine (Cl₂).

H2.text: A compound is sodium chloride, which is formed in a chemical reaction between sodium (Na) and chlorine (Cl₂).

H3.text: An atom is sodium chloride, formed in a chemical reaction between sodium (Na) and chlorine (Cl₂).

A4.text: Sodium chloride is an ionic compound with the chemical formula NaCl, representing a 1:1 ratio of sodium and chloride ions.
